member.summary: Transfers the account data to a file.
member.param: The username of the account for transferring.
Path to the file where the data will be written to.

members.member:
Recoveries account on the device.
Path to the file with transferring data. Data about user that will be written on the new device. If it is recovered all data from the file. Otherwise passed parameter writes in the database and the key from the file joins him. It can be useful when the database on the new device already has account with same username. Throws if there are problems with account transfer. Throws if the authentication data can't be read from file because the file is corrupted.
